Subject: Bobby Abreu learns new position
Bobby Abreu has made noteable progress
learning his new position, First Base.
I would rate his skills as "E" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1992
Subject: Progress of Takashi Saito
Dear Sir,
Takashi Saito is doing pretty good at A Salem Buccaneers!
He has an ERA of 1.45, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
